Class Scholar

  • java.lang.Object
    • Scholar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Scholar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A data-oriented class. Scholars are the people used in this program.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
